source:
%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW staff_cost AS 
SELECT DISTINCT
    h.pers_no as EmployeeID,
    h.ps_group as Grade, 
	h.annual_salary as Salary, 
    cast(cast(h.annual_salary as float)/(365.0*7.4) as float) as HourlyRate,
    cast(${EXPECTED_FROM_VAR} as date) as ReportMonthEndDate,
    le.LeaveDaysPerYear as LeaveAllowance,
    cast(case sign(datediff(day, cast(le.LeaveYearStart as date), ${EXPECTED_FROM_VAR}))
				when 1 then le.LeaveYearStart
				when 0 then le.LeaveYearStart
				else dateadd(year, -1, le.LeaveYearStart)
			end as date) as LeaveStartDate,
    le.leavedaysperyear*(1 - abs((((datediff(day, cast(
                                                    CASE sign(datediff(day, cast(le.leaveyearstart AS date), ${EXPECTED_FROM_VAR}))
                                                    WHEN 1 THEN
                                                    le.leaveyearstart
                                                    ELSE dateadd(year, -1, le.leaveyearstart)
                                                    END
                                                    AS date), ${EXPECTED_FROM_VAR}))/364.25)%1))) AS ExpectedLeaveHoursRemaining
    
FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_saphr h
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_leave_entitlement_dim le on h.pers_no = le.EmployeeID
WHERE
    le.AbsenceQuotaType = 'Annual Leave / P&P' 
    AND le.IsActive = 'Y'

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW carried_over AS 
SELECT DISTINCT
    h.pers_no AS EmployeeID,
    FORMAT_NUMBER( 
        CASE
            SIGN(le.LeaveDaysPerYear - 148) 
            WHEN
                1 
            THEN
                148 
            WHEN
                0 
            THEN
                148 
            ELSE
                le.LeaveDaysPerYear 
        END
    , 2) AS CarriedOverHours 
FROM
    odw_standardised_db.vw_saphr h 
    LEFT JOIN
        odw_harmonised_db.hr_leave_entitlement_dim le 
        ON h.pers_no = le.EmployeeID 
WHERE
    le.AbsenceQuotaType = 'Brought Forward' 
    AND le.IsActive = 'Y';

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW leave_taken AS 
SELECT DISTINCT
   a.EmployeeID,
   CASE
      WHEN
         sc.ReportMonthEndDate >= a.AbsenceEndDate 
      THEN
         a.Hours 
      ELSE
         a.Hours - (w.WorkDayHours * datediff(a.AbsenceEndDate, sc.ReportMonthEndDate)) 
   END
   AS LeaveHours, 
   a.Days, 
   a.Hours, 
   a.CalendarDays, 
   a.AbsenceStartDate, 
   a.AbsenceEndDate, 
   sc.LeaveStartDate 
FROM
   odw_harmonised_db.hr_absence_dim a 
   LEFT JOIN
      odw_harmonised_db.hr_work_schedule_dim w 
      ON a.WorkScheduleID = w.WorkScheduleID 
   LEFT JOIN
      staff_cost sc 
      ON a.EmployeeID = sc.EmployeeID 
WHERE
   a.AbsenceType IN 
   (
      'PT Annual / P&P Leave', 'FT Annual / Priv Leave'
   )
   AND a.AbsenceStartDate BETWEEN sc.LeaveStartDate AND sc.ReportMonthEndDate 
   AND a.IsActive = 'Y'
ORDER BY
   EmployeeID, AbsenceStartDate

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW leave_taken_fixed AS 
SELECT
   EmployeeID,
   FORMAT_NUMBER(SUM(LeaveHours), 2) AS LeaveHoursTaken 
FROM
   leave_taken 
WHERE
   EmployeeID IS NOT NULL 
   AND LeaveStartDate <= AbsenceStartDate 
GROUP BY
   EmployeeID 
ORDER BY
   EmployeeID

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW mipins_hr_measures

     AS
	 
SELECT DISTINCT
	h.pers_no,
	h.first_name,
	h.last_name,
	h.employee_no,
	h.cocd,
	h.company_code,
	h.pa,
	h.personnel_area,
	h.psubarea,
	h.personnel_subarea,
	h.org_unit,
	h.organizational_unit,
	h.organizational_key1,
	h.organizational_key2,
	h.workc,
	h.work_contract,
	h.ct,
	h.contract_type,
	h.ps_group,
	h.pay_band_description,
	h.fte,
	h.wk_hrs,
	h.indicator_part_time_employee,
	h.s,
	h.employment_status,
	h.gender_key,
	h.tra_start_date,
	h.tra_end_date,
	h.tra_status,
	h.tra_grade,
	h.prev_persno,
	h.actr,
	h.reason_for_action,
	h.position,
	h.position_1,
	h.cost_ctr,
	h.cost_centre,
	h.civil_service_start,
	h.date_to_current_job,
	h.seniority_date,
	h.date_to_subst_grade,
	h.pers_no_1,
	h.name_of_manager_om,
	h.manager_position,
	h.manager_position_text,
	h.counter_sign_manager,
	h.loc,
	h.location,
	h.org_start_date,
	h.fix_term_end_date,
	h.loan_start_date,
	h.loan_end_date,
	h.eegrp,
	h.employee_group,
	h.annual_salary,
	h.curr,
	h.ni_number,
	h.birth_date,
	h.age_of_employee,
	h.eo,
	h.ethnic_origin,
	h.nid,
	h.rel,
	h.religious_denomination_key,
	h.sxo,
	h.wage_type,
	h.employee_subgroup,
	h.loa_abs_type,
	h.loa_absence_type_text,
	h.scheme_reference,
	h.pension_scheme_name,
	h.disability_code,
	h.disability_text,
	h.disability_code_description,
	h.parea,
	h.payroll_area,
	h.assignment_number,
	h.fte_2,
	${EXPECTED_FROM_VAR} AS Report_MonthEnd_Date,
	coalesce(sc.LeaveAllowance, 0) + coalesce(co.CarriedOverHours, 0) 	AS leave_entitlement_hrs,
	coalesce(lt.LeaveHoursTaken, 0) 									AS leave_taken_hrs,
	round((coalesce(sc.LeaveAllowance, 0) + 
		coalesce(co.CarriedOverHours, 0) - 
		coalesce(sc.ExpectedLeaveHoursRemaining, 0)  - 
		coalesce(lt.LeaveHoursTaken, 0)), 2) 							AS leave_remaining_hours,
	coalesce(round(sc.ExpectedLeaveHoursRemaining, 2), 0) 				AS leave_remaining_prorata_hours,
	h.expected_from
	--,coalesce(round((coalesce(sc.LeaveAllowance, 0) + coalesce(co.CarriedOverHours, 0) - coalesce(sc.ExpectedLeaveHoursRemaining, 0)  - coalesce(lt.LeaveHoursTaken, 0)) * (sc.hourly_rate) * (1 + p.Total), 2),0.0) as cost_untaken_al
from odw_standardised_db.vw_saphr h
	left join staff_cost sc on cast(h.pers_no as int) = cast(sc.EmployeeID as int)
	left join carried_over co on cast(sc.EmployeeID as int) = cast(co.EmployeeID as int)
	left join leave_taken_fixed lt on cast(sc.EmployeeID as int) = cast(lt.EmployeeID as int)
	left join odw_standardised_db.bis_pension_ernic_rates p on sc.Grade = p.Grade
where 
	right(cast(cast(${EXPECTED_FROM_VAR} as date) as varchar(10)),5) in ('01-31','02-28','02-29','03-31','04-30','05-31','06-30','07-31','08-31','09-30','10-31','11-30','12-31')

# Check for new, updated or deleted data
- This script checks for new, updated or deleted data by checking the source data (horizon tables) against the target (odw_harmonised_db.casework tables)
- **New Data:** where an main Reference in the source does not exist in the target, then NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Updated data:** Comparison occurs on Reference Fields in source and in target where the row hash is different i.e. there is a change in one of the columns. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Deleted data:** where an Reference info in the target exists but the same identifyers don't exist in the source. DeletedData flag is set to 'Y'

## View mipins_hr_measures_new is created

%%sql
-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW mipins_hr_measures_new 

    AS

-- gets data that matches of EmployeeID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT DISTINCT
    CASE
        WHEN h.pers_no IS NULL
        THEN T5.MeasureID
        ELSE NULL
    END                             AS  MeasureID, -- surrogate
    h.pers_no	                    AS	EmployeeID	,
    h.first_name	                AS	FirstName	,
    h.last_name	                    AS	LastName	,
    h.employee_no	                AS	EmployeeNo	,
    h.cocd	                        AS	CoCd	,
    h.company_code	                AS	CompanyCode	,
    h.pa	                        AS	PA	,
    h.personnel_area	            AS	PersonnelArea	,
    h.psubarea	                    AS	PSubArea	,
    h.personnel_subarea	            AS	PersonnelSubArea	,
    h.org_unit	                    AS	OrgUnit	,
    h.organizational_unit	        AS	OrganizationalUnit	,
    h.organizational_key1	        AS	OrganizationalKey1	,
    h.organizational_key2	        AS	OrganizationalKey2	,
    h.workc	                        AS	WorkC	,
    h.work_contract	                AS	WorkContract	,
    h.ct	                        AS	CT	,
    h.contract_type	                AS	ContractType	,
    h.ps_group	                    AS	PSGroup	,
    h.pay_band_description	        AS	PayBandDescription	,
    h.fte	                        AS	FTE	,
    h.wk_hrs	                    AS	WeekHours	,
    h.indicator_part_time_employee	AS	IndicatorPartTimeEmployee	,
    h.s	                            AS	S	,
    h.employment_status	            AS	EmploymentStatus	,
    h.gender_key	                AS	GenderKey	,
    h.tra_start_date	            AS	TRAStartDate	,
    h.tra_end_date	                AS	TRAEndDate	,
    h.tra_status	                AS	TRAStatus	,
    h.tra_grade	                    AS	TRAGrade	,
    h.prev_persno	                AS	PrevPersNo	,
    h.actr	                        AS	Actr	,
    h.reason_for_action	            AS	ReasonForAction	,
    h.position	                    AS	Position	,
    h.position_1	                AS	Position1	,
    h.cost_ctr	                    AS	CostCtr	,
    h.cost_centre	                AS	CostCentre	,
    h.civil_service_start	        AS	CivilServiceStart	,
    h.date_to_current_job	        AS	DateToCurrentJob	,
    h.seniority_date	            AS	SeniorityDate	,
    h.date_to_subst_grade	        AS	DateToSubstGrade	,
    h.pers_no_1	                    AS	PersNo1	,
    h.name_of_manager_om	        AS	NameOfManagerOm	,
    h.manager_position	            AS	ManagerPosition	,
    h.manager_position_text	        AS	ManagerPositionText	,
    h.counter_sign_manager	        AS	CounterSignManager	,
    h.loc	                        AS	Loc	,
    h.location	                    AS	Location	,
    h.org_start_date	            AS	OrgStartDate	,
    h.fix_term_end_date	            AS	FixTermEndDate	,
    h.loan_start_date	            AS	LoanStartDate	,
    h.loan_end_date	                AS	LoanEndDate	,
    h.eegrp	                        AS	EEGrp	,
    h.employee_group	            AS	EmployeeGroup	,
    h.annual_salary	                AS	AnnualSalary	,
    h.curr	                        AS	Curr	,
    h.ni_number	                    AS	NINumber	,
    h.birth_date	                AS	BirthDate	,
    h.age_of_employee	            AS	AgeOfEmployee	,
    h.eo	                        AS	EO	,
    h.ethnic_origin	                AS	EthnicOrigin	,
    h.nid	                        AS	NID	,
    h.rel	                        AS	Rel	,
    h.religious_denomination_key	AS	ReligiousDenominationKey	,
    h.sxo	                        AS	Sxo	,
    h.wage_type	                    AS	WageType	,
    h.employee_subgroup	            AS	EmployeeSubgroup	,
    h.loa_abs_type	                AS	LoaAbsType	,
    h.loa_absence_type_text	        AS	LoaAbsenceTypeText	,
    h.scheme_reference	            AS	SchemeReference	,
    h.pension_scheme_name	        AS	PensionSchemeName	,
    h.disability_code	            AS	DisabilityCode	,
    h.disability_text	            AS	DisabilityText	,
    h.disability_code_description	AS	DisabilityCodeDescription	,
    h.parea	                        AS	PArea	,
    h.payroll_area	                AS	PayrollArea	,
    h.assignment_number	            AS	AssignmentNumber	,
    h.fte_2	                        AS	FTE2	,
    h.Report_MonthEnd_Date	        AS	ReportMonthEndDate	,
    h.leave_entitlement_hrs	        AS	LeaveEntitlementHours	,
    h.leave_taken_hrs	            AS	LeaveTakenHours	,
    h.leave_remaining_hours	        AS	LeaveRemainingHours	,
    h.leave_remaining_prorata_hours	AS	LeaveRemainingProrataHours,
    T2.SourceSystemID as SourceSystemID,
    h.expected_from                 AS IngestionDate,
    NULL                            AS ValidTo,
    md5(
        concat(
            IFNULL(h.pers_no,'.'),
            IFNULL(CAST(h.Report_MonthEnd_Date as VARCHAR(20)),'.'),
            IFNULL(h.leave_entitlement_hrs,'.'),
            IFNULL(h.leave_taken_hrs,'.'),
            IFNULL(h.leave_remaining_hours,'.'),
            IFNULL(h.leave_remaining_prorata_hours,'.')
            )
        )                           AS RowID,
    'Y'                             AS IsActive,
    T5.IsActive                     AS HistoricIsActive

FROM mipins_hr_measures h
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description AND T2.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_curated_db.mipins_hr_measures T5 ON h.pers_no = T5.EmployeeID AND T5.IsActive = 'Y'

WHERE
    -- flags new data        
    CASE
        WHEN h.pers_no = T5.EmployeeID AND md5(
            concat(
                IFNULL(h.pers_no,'.'),
                IFNULL(CAST(h.Report_MonthEnd_Date as VARCHAR(20)),'.'),
                IFNULL(h.leave_entitlement_hrs,'.'),
                IFNULL(h.leave_taken_hrs,'.'),
                IFNULL(h.leave_remaining_hours,'.'),
                IFNULL(h.leave_remaining_prorata_hours,'.')
            )) <> T5.RowID    -- same employee, changed data
        THEN 'Y'
        WHEN T5.EmployeeID IS NULL 
        THEN 'Y'
    ELSE 'N'
    END  = 'Y'
AND h.pers_no IS NOT NULL;

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **mipins_hr_measures_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View mipins_hr_measures_changed_rows is created

%%sql

-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW mipins_hr_measures_changed_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 

Select 
    MeasureID, -- surrogate 
    EmployeeID	,
    FirstName	,
    LastName	,
    EmployeeNo	,
    CoCd	,
    CompanyCode	,
    PA	,
    PersonnelArea	,
    PSubArea	,
    PersonnelSubArea	,
    OrgUnit	,
    OrganizationalUnit	,
    OrganizationalKey1	,
    OrganizationalKey2	,
    WorkC	,
    WorkContract	,
    CT	,
    ContractType	,
    PSGroup	,
    PayBandDescription	,
    FTE	,
    WeekHours	,
    IndicatorPartTimeEmployee	,
    S	,
    EmploymentStatus	,
    GenderKey	,
    TRAStartDate	,
    TRAEndDate	,
    TRAStatus	,
    TRAGrade	,
    PrevPersNo	,
    Actr	,
    ReasonForAction	,
    Position	,
    Position1	,
    CostCtr	,
    CostCentre	,
    CivilServiceStart	,
    DateToCurrentJob	,
    SeniorityDate	,
    DateToSubstGrade	,
    PersNo1	,
    NameOfManagerOm	,
    ManagerPosition	,
    ManagerPositionText	,
    CounterSignManager	,
    Loc	,
    Location	,
    OrgStartDate	,
    FixTermEndDate	,
    LoanStartDate	,
    LoanEndDate	,
    EEGrp	,
    EmployeeGroup	,
    AnnualSalary	,
    Curr	,
    NINumber	,
    BirthDate	,
    AgeOfEmployee	,
    EO	,
    EthnicOrigin	,
    NID	,
    Rel	,
    ReligiousDenominationKey	,
    Sxo	,
    WageType	,
    EmployeeSubgroup	,
    LoaAbsType	,
    LoaAbsenceTypeText	,
    SchemeReference	,
    PensionSchemeName	,
    DisabilityCode	,
    DisabilityText	,
    DisabilityCodeDescription	,
    PArea	,
    PayrollArea	,
    AssignmentNumber	,
    FTE2	,
    ReportMonthEndDate	,
    LeaveEntitlementHours	,
    LeaveTakenHours	,
    LeaveRemainingHours	,
    LeaveRemainingProrataHours	,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
From mipins_hr_measures_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'

SELECT
    MeasureID, -- surrogate 
    EmployeeID	,
    FirstName	,
    LastName	,
    EmployeeNo	,
    CoCd	,
    CompanyCode	,
    PA	,
    PersonnelArea	,
    PSubArea	,
    PersonnelSubArea	,
    OrgUnit	,
    OrganizationalUnit	,
    OrganizationalKey1	,
    OrganizationalKey2	,
    WorkC	,
    WorkContract	,
    CT	,
    ContractType	,
    PSGroup	,
    PayBandDescription	,
    FTE	,
    WeekHours	,
    IndicatorPartTimeEmployee	,
    S	,
    EmploymentStatus	,
    GenderKey	,
    TRAStartDate	,
    TRAEndDate	,
    TRAStatus	,
    TRAGrade	,
    PrevPersNo	,
    Actr	,
    ReasonForAction	,
    Position	,
    Position1	,
    CostCtr	,
    CostCentre	,
    CivilServiceStart	,
    DateToCurrentJob	,
    SeniorityDate	,
    DateToSubstGrade	,
    PersNo1	,
    NameOfManagerOm	,
    ManagerPosition	,
    ManagerPositionText	,
    CounterSignManager	,
    Loc	,
    Location	,
    OrgStartDate	,
    FixTermEndDate	,
    LoanStartDate	,
    LoanEndDate	,
    EEGrp	,
    EmployeeGroup	,
    AnnualSalary	,
    Curr	,
    NINumber	,
    BirthDate	,
    AgeOfEmployee	,
    EO	,
    EthnicOrigin	,
    NID	,
    Rel	,
    ReligiousDenominationKey	,
    Sxo	,
    WageType	,
    EmployeeSubgroup	,
    LoaAbsType	,
    LoaAbsenceTypeText	,
    SchemeReference	,
    PensionSchemeName	,
    DisabilityCode	,
    DisabilityText	,
    DisabilityCodeDescription	,
    PArea	,
    PayrollArea	,
    AssignmentNumber	,
    FTE2	,
    ReportMonthEndDate	,
    LeaveEntitlementHours	,
    LeaveTakenHours	,
    LeaveRemainingHours	,
    LeaveRemainingProrataHours	,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_curated_db.mipins_hr_measures
WHERE EmployeeID IN (SELECT EmployeeID FROM mipins_hr_measures_new WHERE MeasureID IS NULL) AND IsActive = 'Y';

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW Loading_month

    AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    IngestionDate AS IngestionDate,
    to_timestamp(date_sub(IngestionDate,1)) AS ClosingDate,
    'Y' AS IsActive

FROM mipins_hr_measures_new;

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW mipins_hr_measures_changed_rows_final

    AS

SELECT 
    MeasureID, 
    EmployeeID	,
    FirstName	,
    LastName	,
    EmployeeNo	,
    CoCd	,
    CompanyCode	,
    PA	,
    PersonnelArea	,
    PSubArea	,
    PersonnelSubArea	,
    OrgUnit	,
    OrganizationalUnit	,
    OrganizationalKey1	,
    OrganizationalKey2	,
    WorkC	,
    WorkContract	,
    CT	,
    ContractType	,
    PSGroup	,
    PayBandDescription	,
    FTE	,
    WeekHours	,
    IndicatorPartTimeEmployee	,
    S	,
    EmploymentStatus	,
    GenderKey	,
    TRAStartDate	,
    TRAEndDate	,
    TRAStatus	,
    TRAGrade	,
    PrevPersNo	,
    Actr	,
    ReasonForAction	,
    Position	,
    Position1	,
    CostCtr	,
    CostCentre	,
    CivilServiceStart	,
    DateToCurrentJob	,
    SeniorityDate	,
    DateToSubstGrade	,
    PersNo1	,
    NameOfManagerOm	,
    ManagerPosition	,
    ManagerPositionText	,
    CounterSignManager	,
    Loc	,
    Location	,
    OrgStartDate	,
    FixTermEndDate	,
    LoanStartDate	,
    LoanEndDate	,
    EEGrp	,
    EmployeeGroup	,
    AnnualSalary	,
    Curr	,
    NINumber	,
    BirthDate	,
    AgeOfEmployee	,
    EO	,
    EthnicOrigin	,
    NID	,
    Rel	,
    ReligiousDenominationKey	,
    Sxo	,
    WageType	,
    EmployeeSubgroup	,
    LoaAbsType	,
    LoaAbsenceTypeText	,
    SchemeReference	,
    PensionSchemeName	,
    DisabilityCode	,
    DisabilityText	,
    DisabilityCodeDescription	,
    PArea	,
    PayrollArea	,
    AssignmentNumber	,
    FTE2	,
    ReportMonthEndDate	,
    LeaveEntitlementHours	,
    LeaveTakenHours	,
    LeaveRemainingHours	,
    LeaveRemainingProrataHours	,
    T1.SourceSystemID,
    T1.IngestionDate,
    T1.ValidTo,
    T1.RowID,
    T1.IsActive,
    T2.ClosingDate
FROM mipins_hr_measures_changed_rows T1
FULL JOIN Loading_month T2 ON T1.IsActive = T2.IsActive

# View mipins_hr_measures_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the surrogate Key (i.e. EmployeeID), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the surrogate Key, insert rows
## Table odw_curated_db.mipins_hr_measures is updated

%%sql
-- merge into fact table

MERGE INTO odw_curated_db.mipins_hr_measures AS Target
USING mipins_hr_measures_changed_rows_final AS Source

ON Source.MeasureID = Target.MeasureID AND Target.IsActive = 'Y'

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = to_timestamp(ClosingDate),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- -- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT (MeasureID, -- surrogate 
        EmployeeID	,
        FirstName	,
        LastName	,
        EmployeeNo	,
        CoCd	,
        CompanyCode	,
        PA	,
        PersonnelArea	,
        PSubArea	,
        PersonnelSubArea	,
        OrgUnit	,
        OrganizationalUnit	,
        OrganizationalKey1	,
        OrganizationalKey2	,
        WorkC	,
        WorkContract	,
        CT	,
        ContractType	,
        PSGroup	,
        PayBandDescription	,
        FTE	,
        WeekHours	,
        IndicatorPartTimeEmployee	,
        S	,
        EmploymentStatus	,
        GenderKey	,
        TRAStartDate	,
        TRAEndDate	,
        TRAStatus	,
        TRAGrade	,
        PrevPersNo	,
        Actr	,
        ReasonForAction	,
        Position	,
        Position1	,
        CostCtr	,
        CostCentre	,
        CivilServiceStart	,
        DateToCurrentJob	,
        SeniorityDate	,
        DateToSubstGrade	,
        PersNo1	,
        NameOfManagerOm	,
        ManagerPosition	,
        ManagerPositionText	,
        CounterSignManager	,
        Loc	,
        Location	,
        OrgStartDate	,
        FixTermEndDate	,
        LoanStartDate	,
        LoanEndDate	,
        EEGrp	,
        EmployeeGroup	,
        AnnualSalary	,
        Curr	,
        NINumber	,
        BirthDate	,
        AgeOfEmployee	,
        EO	,
        EthnicOrigin	,
        NID	,
        Rel	,
        ReligiousDenominationKey	,
        Sxo	,
        WageType	,
        EmployeeSubgroup	,
        LoaAbsType	,
        LoaAbsenceTypeText	,
        SchemeReference	,
        PensionSchemeName	,
        DisabilityCode	,

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_curated_db.mipins_hr_measures is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new MeasureID

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_curated_db.mipins_hr_measures

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY MeasureID NULLS LAST) AS MeasureID, -- surrogate key
    EmployeeID	,
    FirstName	,
    LastName	,
    EmployeeNo	,
    CoCd	,
    CompanyCode	,
    PA	,
    PersonnelArea	,
    PSubArea	,
    PersonnelSubArea	,

    OrganizationalUnit	,

    TRAStartDate	,
